channel.title: The Bootstrap Blog on Muse
channel.description: Recent content in The Bootstrap Blog on Muse

item.title: State of the Community 02/2024
item.description: A thank-you to all our amazing musical contributors as we head into the Spring season! Last month, we broke our all-time record for user contributions, with over 3,000 new albums, EPs, and singles documented on Muse. Congratulations to the winners of the January Top Contributer award: SkiiBaller and LongNamesAreWack, who will be receiving six months of Muse Pro free of charge. UPDATE 03/19/24: Stay tuned for news on next round of the contribution context ;)
